ingredients.content: 2 oz green onions, green top part only
2 oz green onions, white part only
4 ½ oz fresh Roma tomatoes, quartered (approx. 1 tomato)

preparations.content: Place green onion tops into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside.

Place white onion parts, chorizo, tomato and ground cumin into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and <b>without measuring cup<b> cook <b>10 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside.
Without washing the mixing bowl, place cheddar cheese into mixing bowl and grate <b>5 sec/speed 6<b>.
Add cream cheese, whipping cream and garlic powder and cook <b>6 min 30 sec/195°F/speed 1<b>. Transfer into a serving bowl.
Serve cooked chorizo in the center of a serving bowl, surrounded by cheese dip and sprinkle with reserved chopped green onion tops.
